document.full_text: the heat asked fans to wear white in the playoffs, but the stark background is a problem for the star guard dwyane wade, who suffers from migraines.
document.title: heat 94, 76ers 73: playoffs' bright lights vexing for heat star prone to migraines
lines_and_colors: the heat asked fans to wear white in the playoffs, but the stark background is a problem for the star guard dwyane wade, who suffers from migraines.
